title: On the generalized Cauchy dual of closed operators in Hilbert spaces
authors: Arup Majumdar, P. Sam Johnson, Ram N. Mohapatra
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce the generalized Cauchy dual $w(T) =
T(T^{*}T)^{\dagger}$ of a closed operator $T$ with the closed range between
Hilbert spaces and present intriguing findings that characterize the Cauchy
dual of $T$. Additionally, we establish the result $w(T^{n}) = (w(T))^{n}$, for
all $n \in \mathbb{N}$, where $T$ is a quasinormal EP operator.
